greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Multiplicities for A111774(n), for n >= 1.
comment: See the triangle and array of A337940 for details.
formula: a(n) gives the number of possibilities to write A111774(n) as a sum of at least three consecutive positive integers.
example: For a(6) = 2 for  A111774(6) = 15 see the example given in A337940.
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Nov 23 2020
